properties.areaDesc: Washington, GA; Wilkinson, GA; Johnson, GA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 9 at 5:21AM EST until February 13 at 10:20PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...
Oconee River near Oconee affecting Johnson...Washington and
Wilkinson Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Oconee River near Oconee.
* Until Thursday evening.
* At 12PM Saturday the stage was 21.0 feet...and
rising/falling/steady.
* Moderate flooding is occurring and forecast to continue.
* Flood stage is 17 feet.
* Forecast to rise to a crest of near 24 feet on Sunday.
* At 23 feet, moderate flooding continues. Portions of the Old Balls
Ferry Road leading to the boat ramp becomes flooded with a foot of
water or more.  The entire dirt parking lot near the boat ramp is
under three to five feet of water. Extensive flooding of the
woodlands near the river continues.

At 25 feet, major flooding occurs. Most of Old Balls Ferry Road
north of Georgia Highway 57 will be under one to three feet of
water. The water level reaches the bottom of the USGS gaging
equipment near the boat ramp. Widespread flooding up to several
feet deep of the woodlands near the river occurs.
